item.title: Daily Harvest Review: Good Meals for Single Vegans Who Don’t Mind Mush
item.description: These vegan, gluten-free delivery meals take the work out of meal prep, although the food can be a little boring (and mushy).

item.title: Ford Maverick Hybrid AWD 2025: prices, specs availability, review
item.description: The new four-wheel-drive electrified pickup has arrived, and it's better than ever. There's just one snag. It's made in Mexico.
